splashScreen.heading: Welcome to Krystal Bull
splashScreen.significantValue: Please do not use it with significant amounts of value at this time.

configuration.heading: Configuration
configuration.useTorTooltip: Use Tor network for external interactions

confirmOracleName.title: Confirm Oracle Name
confirmOracleName.content: Are you sure you want to set your Oracle Name to '{{oracleName}}'? Once used it cannot be changed.

signedBelowMinimum.title: Signed message below minimum
signedBelowMinimum.content: You entered {{input}}, which is below the minimum value. {{min}} was signed.

signedAboveMaximum.title: Signed message above maximum
signedAboveMaximum.content: You entered {{input}}, which is above the maximum value. {{max}} was signed.

deleteAnnouncement.title: Delete Announcement
deleteAnnouncement.content: Are you sure you want to delete this announcement?

deleteAttestation.title: Delete Attestation
deleteAttestation.content: Are you sure you want to delete this attestation? If you have shared the previous attestation it can expose your private keys.

logout.title: Session Expiring
logout.content: You will be logged out in {{ time }} seconds.

error.oracleName: An Oracle Name must be set before creating announcements

description.enum: Enum announcements have a fixed set of outcomes
description.numeric: Numeric announcements have a range of outcomes

createAnnouncementDescription.name: Name for this announcement
createAnnouncementDescription.maturationTime: The earliest expected time an outcome will be signed, given in ISO 8601 format
createAnnouncementDescription.maturationTimeSeconds: The earliest expected time an outcome will be signed, given in epoch second
createAnnouncementDescription.unit: The unit denomination of the outcome value
createAnnouncementDescription.precision: The precision of the outcome representing the base exponent by which to multiply the number represented by the composition of the digits to obtain the actual outcome value.
createAnnouncementDescription.base: The base in which the outcome value is decomposed
createAnnouncementDescription.numdigits: The max number of digits the outcome can have
createAnnouncementDescription.signed: Whether the outcomes can be negative

createAnnouncementErrors.negative: Value must be zero or more
createAnnouncementErrors.outcomeMinTwo: Must have at least two outcomes

announcementDetail.heading: Announcement Detail
announcementDetail.outcomeIsNotBroadcast: This announcement outcome is not broadcast
announcementDetail.outcomeMustBeInSet: The outcome must be one of {{ outcomes }}
